pages.text: $(li)Sheep are common passive creatures that can be found over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop Wool and Raw Mutton on death.$(br)$(li)They can be breed giving them Wheat.$(br)$(li)You can right click on a Sheep while you are holding Shears to obtain Wool.
The Sheep will regenerate its Wool in a few minutes eating Grass on the ground.
